soot.jimple.infoflow.android.manifest

Class ProcessManifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.android.manifest.ProcessManifest

  • public class ProcessManifest
extends Object
    This class provides easy access to all data of an AppManifest.
    Nodes and attributes of a parsed manifest can be changed. A new byte compressed manifest considering the changes can be generated.
    Author:
    Steven Arzt, Stefan Haas, Mario Schlipf
    See Also:
    App Manifest

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ProcessManifest.ComponentType
      Enumeration containing the various component types supported in Android

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessManifest

        public ProcessManifest(String apkPath)
                throws IOException,
                       org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        Processes an AppManifest which is within the file identified by the given path.
        Parameters:
        apkPath - file path to an APK.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - can occur due to a malformed manifest.

      • ProcessManifest

        public ProcessManifest(File apkFile)
                throws IOException,
                       org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        Processes an AppManifest which is within the given File.
        Parameters:
        apkFile - the AppManifest within the given APK will be parsed.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - can occur due to a malformed manifest.
        See Also:
        ProcessManifest#ProcessManifest(InputStream)}

      • ProcessManifest

        public ProcessManifest(InputStream manifestIS)
                throws IOException,
                       org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        Processes an AppManifest which is provided by the given InputStream.
        Parameters:
        manifestIS - InputStream for an AppManifest.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - can occur due to a malformed manifest.

               throws IOException,
                      org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
        Initialises the ProcessManifest by parsing the manifest provided by the given InputStream.
        Parameters:
        manifestIS - InputStream for an AppManifest.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException - can occur due to a malformed manifest.

      • getApk

        public ApkHandler getApk()
        Returns the handler which opened the APK file. If ProcessManifest was instanciated directly with an InputStream this will return null.
        Returns:
        APK Handler

      • getComponentType

        public ProcessManifest.ComponentType getComponentType(String className)
        Gets the type of the component identified by the given class name
        Parameters:
        className - The class name for which to get the component type
        Returns:
        The component type of the given class if this class has been registered as a component in the manifest file, otherwise null

        Returns:
        node with name.

      • getOutput

        public byte[] getOutput()
        Returns the Manifest as a compressed android xml byte array. This will consider all changes made to the manifest and application nodes respectively to their child nodes.
        Returns:
        byte compressed AppManifest
        See Also:
        AXmlHandler.toByteArray()
